questions.description: Which statement best describes what a "scope" is in JavaScript?

choices.value: The environment in which values, variables and expressions are "visible" and can be referenced.
The value of "this" during function execution or the object to which the function belongs.
The environment in which values and expressions can be defined.

questions.description: When is function scope determined in JavaScript?

choices.value: Dynamically, when functions are called or executed.
Statically, when function declarations are parsed or evaluated.
At runtime, when variables are assigned or referenced.
